thread.title: Sia Wants Kanye West To Keep Fur Out Of Future Yeezy Clothing Lines
thread.title_full: Sia Wants Kanye West To Keep Fur Out Of Future Yeezy Clothing Lines

author: Kyle Eustice
title: Sia Wants Kanye West To Keep Fur Out Of Future Yeezy Clothing Lines
text:
4 
New York, NY ‚Äì Kanye West once again took his Yeezy line to the runway and presented his Season 5 Collection at Pier 59 for New York City Fashion Week on Wednesday (February 15), keeping things mostly low-key after some initial pushback from the fashion industry. This year‚Äôs line favored more monochromatic looks, with West opting to include new colorways, including burgundy and a dark shade of blue, while retaining a few of his favorite concepts from past releases like camo, black and denim. 
The collection also features high-end and athletic pieces such as long-extensive fur coats, embroidered jackets, track jackets, sheer jackets, extended crew neck sweaters, hoodies, sweat pants, thigh-high boots, running sneakers, and bags. 
But not everyone was thrilled with his line. 
Enigmatic pop singer-songwriter Sia apparently saw the models sauntering down the runway in mink jackets and fur-trimmed vests and took it upon herself to politely ask West to consider going ‚Äúfur free‚Äù in the future. ‚ÄúDear @kanyewest would you consider going fur free?,‚Äù she wrote on Twitter. ‚ÄúThis is the reality of fur fashion ‚Äî it‚Äôs so sad.‚Äù She then linked to a graphic video that exposes the conditions of animals used for fur. Dear @kanyewest would you consider going fur free? This is the reality of fur for fashion ‚Äì it's so sad üò∞ https://t.co/fdUhN78nlg 
‚Äî sia (@Sia) February 15, 2017 
As of now, Yeezy has yet to reply to her request. 
The 13-minute fashion show showed off the adidas x Calabasas athletic collection as well and a pair of Yeezy Runners. While the release date for the items has yet to be revealed, all of Yeezy Season 5‚Äôs looks can be found below. YEEZY SEASON 5 pic.twitter.com/c6R5iByXVJ
